scenario_text.value:
Kaito... This isn’t really what you want, is
it? Why are you doing this?!

Don’t you talk to me like you know what
I want. You don’t know anything about me!

Okay, look. Maybe I don’t know everything
about you, but here’s what I do know!

You’ve always been rough around the edges,
but you never did anything too crazy!

You’ve never been the kind of person who’d
bring suffering to countless innocent people!
And because of that, I lost Miu!

I was wrong! This is what I should’ve done
from the start!
